rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0001
rows.name:
Right, then... So how are we supposed
to track down this Kiku?

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0002
rows.name:
Can we not just ask around in the
streets like we usually do?

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0003
rows.name:
Might not be that helpful...
It was night when it happened,
so I doubt many people saw her.

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0004
rows.name:
Meh-heh-heh...
Time for Tora to show genius skills!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0005
rows.name: You have some kind of idea, Tora?

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0006
rows.name:
Tora sure it must be Dadapon who
finish building Kiku.

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0007
rows.name: Yes, you told us as much last night.

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0008
rows.name:
And Hana made based on blueprints
Tora got from Dadapon.

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0009
rows.name:
So Kiku and Hana use basically
same design.

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0010
rows.name:
Which would mean...they are
constructed from very similar
materials?

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0011
rows.name: Exactly yes!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0012
rows.name: Oh, I get it...

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0013
rows.name:
If we ask around to find out who's been
buying those materials in Superbia,
it might lead us to whoever built her.

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0014
rows.name: Rare good suggestion from Masterpon!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0015
rows.name:
So, Tora, what materials exactly would
they need to make an artificial Blade?

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0016
rows.name:
Well... Ether furnace is obvious,
but apart from that, also need...

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0017
rows.name: Tetra-Circle!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0018
rows.name: Snake Joint!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0019
rows.name: Black Ash!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0020
rows.name: Delta Vessel!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0021
rows.name: Rabbit Diode!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0022
rows.name: Morph Orb!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0023
rows.name: Photonic Coil!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0024
rows.name: Fairy-Tale Belt Pulley!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0025
rows.name: Arc Indicator!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0026
rows.name: Insect Chip!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0027
rows.name: Perfect Range Sensor!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0028
rows.name: Bion Connector!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0029
rows.name: Wait, wait, wait!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0030
rows.name:
Nobody's gonna be able to
remember all that!

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0031
rows.name:
Tora not even say one-thirtieth
of list yet...

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0032
rows.name:
There were a couple of names in there
that sounded familiar, though.

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0033
rows.name:
That Bion Connector was meant to be
easy to salvage around Gula, right?

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0034
rows.name:
Actually, almost impossible to find
anywhere OTHER than Gula
around this season.

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0035
rows.name:
So whoever we're looking for would
have to import them from Gula.
Am I right?

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0036
rows.name:
Perhaps we might find some leads
at Port Anangham.

rows.label: fev04_260_125_msg0037
rows.name:
We don't have much else to go on,
so it's worth a try.
